verses.name: Isaiah 10:7
verses.text: Howbeit he meaneth not so, neither doth his heart think so; but it is in his heart to destroy and cut off nations not a few.

verses.name: Isaiah 10:8
verses.text: For he saith, Are not my princes altogether kings?

verses.name: Isaiah 10:9
verses.text: Is not Calno as Carchemish? is not Hamath as Arpad? is not Samaria as Damascus?

verses.name: Isaiah 10:10
verses.text: As my hand hath found the kingdoms of the idols, and whose graven images did excel them of Jerusalem and of Samaria;

verses.name: Isaiah 10:11
verses.text: Shall I not, as I have done unto Samaria and her idols, so do to Jerusalem and her idols?
